hiveArticle.title: Hashnode Started Giving Crypto Rewards
hiveArticle.body:
Hashnode is StackOverflow like community where you can ask questions, have discussions, create poll etc. According to Hasnode "Hashnode is a platform built and optimised for developers by developers. You can ask, answer, write story, share and discover links here. üç∫ Hmm‚Ä¶ You can place us somewhere between Quora and StackOverflow."

Recently they have introduced Crypto Rewards (XLM) for asking great questions or answers. As of now they have introduced the Stellar Rewards for Good Questions and Answers which is selected by their team.

Full News : https://hashnode.com/crypto-rewards

I think it is a very bold move and people will engage more and more with the community.
